explains: adj. 早做准备的；提前的

sentences.en: I wish we'd known about it beforehand.
sentences.cn: 要是我们预先知道这事就好了。

sentences.en: I have to say in her defence that she knew nothing about it beforehand.
sentences.cn: 我得为她说句话，她事先并不知道此事。

sentences.en: It is reasonable to assume that he knew beforehand that this would happen.
sentences.cn: 有理由认为他事先就知道会发生这样的事。
